% \input{commands.tex}

% Bold symbol definition
$
\newcommand{\bm}[1]{{\boldsymbol #1}}
$

% Vectors
$
\def\vzero{{\bm{0}}}
\def\vone{{\bm{1}}}
\def\vmu{{\bm{\mu}}}
\def\vtheta{{\bm{\theta}}}
\def\va{{\bm{a}}}
\def\vb{{\bm{b}}}
\def\vc{{\bm{c}}}
\def\vd{{\bm{d}}}
\def\ve{{\bm{e}}}
\def\vf{{\bm{f}}}
\def\vg{{\bm{g}}}
\def\vh{{\bm{h}}}
\def\vi{{\bm{i}}}
\def\vj{{\bm{j}}}
\def\vk{{\bm{k}}}
\def\vl{{\bm{l}}}
\def\vm{{\bm{m}}}
\def\vn{{\bm{n}}}
\def\vo{{\bm{o}}}
\def\vp{{\bm{p}}}
\def\vq{{\bm{q}}}
\def\vr{{\bm{r}}}
\def\vs{{\bm{s}}}
\def\vt{{\bm{t}}}
\def\vu{{\bm{u}}}
\def\vv{{\bm{v}}}
\def\vw{{\bm{w}}}
\def\vx{{\bm{x}}}
\def\vy{{\bm{y}}}
\def\vz{{\bm{z}}}
$

% Elements of vectors
$
\def\evalpha{{\alpha}}
\def\evbeta{{\beta}}

\def\evlambda{{\lambda}}

\def\evf{{f}}

\def\evj{{j}}

\def\evl{{l}}
\def\evm{{m}}

\def\evq{{q}}
\def\evr{{r}}
\def\evs{{s}}
\def\evt{{t}}
\def\evu{{u}}

\def\evw{{w}}

\def\evy{{y}}
\def\evz{{z}}
$

% Matrix
$

\def\mA{{\bm{A}}}

\def\mH{{\bm{H}}}

\def\mJ{{\bm{J}}}
\def\mK{{\bm{K}}}
\def\mL{{\bm{L}}}
\def\mM{{\bm{M}}}
\def\mN{{\bm{N}}}
\def\mO{{\bm{O}}}
\def\mP{{\bm{P}}}
\def\mQ{{\bm{Q}}}
\def\mR{{\bm{R}}}
\def\mS{{\bm{S}}}
\def\mT{{\bm{T}}}
\def\mU{{\bm{U}}}
\def\mV{{\bm{V}}}
\def\mW{{\bm{W}}}
\def\mX{{\bm{X}}}
\def\mY{{\bm{Y}}}
\def\mZ{{\bm{Z}}}
\def\mBeta{{\bm{\beta}}}
\def\mPhi{{\bm{\Phi}}}
\def\mLambda{{\bm{\Lambda}}}
\def\mSigma{{\bm{\Sigma}}}
$

% Sets
$
\def\sA{{\mathbb{A}}}
\def\sB{{\mathbb{B}}}
\def\sC{{\mathbb{C}}}
\def\sD{{\mathbb{D}}}
% Don't use a set called E, because this would be the same as our symbol
% for expectation.
\def\sF{{\mathbb{F}}}
\def\sG{{\mathbb{G}}}
\def\sH{{\mathbb{H}}}
\def\sI{{\mathbb{I}}}
\def\sJ{{\mathbb{J}}}
\def\sK{{\mathbb{K}}}
\def\sL{{\mathbb{L}}}
\def\sM{{\mathbb{M}}}
\def\sN{{\mathbb{N}}}
\def\sO{{\mathbb{O}}}
\def\sP{{\mathbb{P}}}
\def\sQ{{\mathbb{Q}}}
\def\sR{{\mathbb{R}}}
\def\sS{{\mathbb{S}}}
\def\sT{{\mathbb{T}}}
\def\sU{{\mathbb{U}}}
\def\sV{{\mathbb{V}}}
\def\sW{{\mathbb{W}}}
\def\sX{{\mathbb{X}}}
\def\sY{{\mathbb{Y}}}
\def\sZ{{\mathbb{Z}}}
$

% Reference Frames
$
\def\rfA{{\{\mA\}}}
\def\rfB{{\{\mB\}}}
\def\rfC{{\{\mC\}}}
\def\rfD{{\{\mD\}}}
\def\rfE{{\{\mE\}}}
\def\rfF{{\{\mF\}}}
\def\rfG{{\{\mG\}}}
\def\rfH{{\{\mH\}}}
\def\rfI{{\{\mI\}}}
\def\rfJ{{\{\mJ\}}}
\def\rfK{{\{\mK\}}}
\def\rfL{{\{\mL\}}}
\def\rfM{{\{\mM\}}}
\def\rfN{{\{\mN\}}}
\def\rfO{{\{\mO\}}}
\def\rfP{{\{\mP\}}}
\def\rfQ{{\{\mQ\}}}
\def\rfR{{\{\mR\}}}
\def\rfS{{\{\mS\}}}
\def\rfT{{\{\mT\}}}
\def\rfU{{\{\mU\}}}
\def\rfV{{\{\mV\}}}
\def\rfW{{\{\mW\}}}
\def\rfX{{\{\mX\}}}
\def\rfY{{\{\mY\}}}
\def\rfZ{{\{\mZ\}}}
$

% Transpose
$
\def\transpose{{\mathsf{T}}}
$

% Aumented vector
$
\def\ava{{\bar{\va}}}

$

% Homogeneous coordibates
$
\def\hca{{\tilde{a}}}
\def\hcb{{\tilde{b}}}
\def\hcc{{\tilde{c}}}
\def\hcd{{\tilde{d}}}

\def\hci{{\tilde{i}}}
\def\hcj{{\tilde{j}}}
\def\hck{{\tilde{k}}}
\def\hcl{{\tilde{l}}}
\def\hcm{{\tilde{m}}}
\def\hcn{{\tilde{n}}}
\def\hco{{\tilde{o}}}
\def\hcp{{\tilde{p}}}
\def\hcq{{\tilde{q}}}
\def\hcr{{\tilde{r}}}
\def\hcs{{\tilde{s}}}
\def\hct{{\tilde{t}}}
\def\hcu{{\tilde{u}}}
\def\hcv{{\tilde{v}}}
\def\hcw{{\tilde{w}}}
\def\hcx{{\tilde{x}}}
\def\hcy{{\tilde{y}}}
\def\hcz{{\tilde{z}}}
$

% Homogeneous vectors: used to represent lines
$
\def\hva{{\tilde{\va}}}
\def\hvb{{\tilde{\vb}}}
\def\hvc{{\tilde{\vc}}}
\def\hvd{{\tilde{\vd}}}
\def\hve{{\tilde{\ve}}}
\def\hvf{{\tilde{\vf}}}
\def\hvg{{\tilde{\vg}}}
\def\hvh{{\tilde{\vh}}}
\def\hvi{{\tilde{\vi}}}
\def\hvj{{\tilde{\vj}}}
\def\hvk{{\tilde{\vk}}}
\def\hvl{{\tilde{\vl}}}
\def\hvm{{\tilde{\vm}}}
\def\hvn{{\tilde{\vn}}}
\def\hvo{{\tilde{\vo}}}
\def\hvp{{\tilde{\vp}}}
\def\hvq{{\tilde{\vq}}}
\def\hvr{{\tilde{\vr}}}
\def\hvs{{\tilde{\vs}}}
\def\hvt{{\tilde{\vt}}}
\def\hvu{{\tilde{\vu}}}
\def\hvv{{\tilde{\vv}}}
\def\hvw{{\tilde{\vw}}}

\def\hvz{{\tilde{\vz}}}
$

% Normal vector
$
\def\nva{{\hat{\va}}}
\def\nvb{{\hat{\vb}}}
\def\nvc{{\hat{\vc}}}
\def\nvd{{\hat{\vd}}}
\def\nve{{\hat{\ve}}}
\def\nvf{{\hat{\vf}}}
\def\nvg{{\hat{\vg}}}
\def\nvh{{\hat{\vh}}}
\def\nvi{{\hat{\vi}}}
\def\nvj{{\hat{\vj}}}
\def\nvk{{\hat{\vk}}}
\def\nvl{{\hat{\vl}}}
\def\nvm{{\hat{\vm}}}
\def\nvn{{\hat{\vn}}}
\def\nvo{{\hat{\vo}}}
\def\nvp{{\hat{\vp}}}
\def\nvq{{\hat{\vq}}}
\def\nvr{{\hat{\vr}}}
\def\nvs{{\hat{\vs}}}
\def\nvt{{\hat{\vt}}}
\def\nvu{{\hat{\vu}}}
\def\nvv{{\hat{\vv}}}
\def\nvw{{\hat{\vw}}}
\def\nvx{{\hat{\vx}}}
\def\nvy{{\hat{\vy}}}
\def\nvz{{\hat{\vz}}}
$

% Normal scalar
$
\def\nsa{{\hat{a}}}

\def\nsj{{\hat{j}}}

\def\nsy{{\hat{y}}}
\def\nsz{{\hat{z}}}
$

% Roll, Pitch and Yaw
$
\def\roll{{\phi}}
\def\pitch{{\theta}}
\def\yaw{{\psi}}
$
